name: AlternativeStartRedux
title: Alternative Start Redux (fix for 0.17)
author: usafphoenix
contact: Please don't. This is a one-off mod.
description: Gives you some options for some alternative starts, please use Mod Settings to select which one you want otherwise you will default to base game start. auto-empty of inventory disabled by usafphoenix to comply with other mods that add items on player creation. Updated to 0.17.
